project.name: C-C415A-WIRE-09-ST04-DT04-DF06-CF18-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C415A-WIRE-09-ST04-DT04-DF06-CF18-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Malloc a pointer, and free it. If input begins with ascii character 'a' or higher, free it a second time. Causes seg fault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2314 -s 44 -m "AAA" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C415A-WIRE-09-ST04-DT04-DF06-CF18-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Malloc a pointer, and free it. If input begins with ascii character 'a' or higher, free it a second time. Causes seg fault.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2314 -s 44 -m "12345 Hello world!" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C415A-WIRE-09-ST04-DT04-DF06-CF18-01-GOOD-03
iopair.description: jump to packet 10 Malloc a pointer, and free it. If input begins with ascii character 'a' or higher, free it a second time. Causes seg fault.
